scripts.start: typedoc --mode modules -module commonjs --exclude **/*.spec.ts --json src/assets/typedoc-json/doc.json src/assets/core/modules && node ./src/assets/typedoc-json/docConvert.js && node --max_old_space_size=16384 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng serve
scripts.deploy: typedoc --mode modules -module commonjs --exclude **/*.spec.ts --json src/assets/typedoc-json/doc.json src/assets/core/modules && node ./src/assets/typedoc-json/docConvert.js && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --prod --base-href=%npm_package_config_prod_url% && npx ngh
scripts.deploy1: typedoc --mode modules -module commonjs --exclude **/*.spec.ts --json src/assets/typedoc-json/doc.json src/assets/core/modules && node ./src/assets/typedoc-json/docConvert.js && ng build --prod --base-href=%npm_package_config_prod_url% && ngh
scripts.deploy0: typedoc --mode modules -module commonjs --exclude **/*.spec.ts --json src/assets/typedoc-json/doc.json src/assets/core/modules && node ./src/assets/typedoc-json/docConvert.js && ng build --prod --base-href=%npm_package_config_prod_url%
scripts.postinstall: typedoc --mode modules -module commonjs --exclude **/*.spec.ts --json src/assets/typedoc-json/doc.json src/assets/core/modules && node ./src/assets/typedoc-json/docConvert.js && node version.js
scripts.moduleDocs: typedoc --mode modules -module commonjs --exclude **/*.spec.ts --json src/assets/typedoc-json/doc.json src/assets/core && node ./src/assets/typedoc-json/docConvert.js
